chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: Thinkest thou this to be right, that thou saidst, My righteousness is more than God's?
items.plainText: Thinkest thou this to be right, that thou saidst, My righteousness is more than God's?

items.text: For thou saidst, What advantage will it be unto thee? and, What profit shall I have, if I be cleansed from my sin?
items.plainText: For thou saidst, What advantage will it be unto thee? and, What profit shall I have, if I be cleansed from my sin?

items.text: I will answer thee, and thy companions with thee.
items.plainText: I will answer thee, and thy companions with thee.

items.text: Look unto the heavens, and see; and behold the clouds which are higher than thou.
items.plainText: Look unto the heavens, and see; and behold the clouds which are higher than thou.

items.text: If thou sinnest, what doest thou against him? or if thy transgressions be multiplied, what doest thou unto him?
items.plainText: If thou sinnest, what doest thou against him? or if thy transgressions be multiplied, what doest thou unto him?

items.text: If thou be righteous, what givest thou him? or what receiveth he of thine hand?
items.plainText: If thou be righteous, what givest thou him? or what receiveth he of thine hand?

items.text: Thy wickedness may hurt a man as thou art; and thy righteousness may profit the son of man.
items.plainText: Thy wickedness may hurt a man as thou art; and thy righteousness may profit the son of man.

items.text: By reason of the multitude of oppressions they make the oppressed to cry: they cry out by reason of the arm of the mighty.
items.plainText: By reason of the multitude of oppressions they make the oppressed to cry: they cry out by reason of the arm of the mighty.

items.text: But none saith, Where is God my maker, who giveth songs in the night;
items.plainText: But none saith, Where is God my maker, who giveth songs in the night;

items.text: Who teacheth us more than the beasts of the earth, and maketh us wiser than the fowls of heaven?
items.plainText: Who teacheth us more than the beasts of the earth, and maketh us wiser than the fowls of heaven?

items.text: There they cry, but none giveth answer, because of the pride of evil men.
items.plainText: There they cry, but none giveth answer, because of the pride of evil men.

items.text: Surely God will not hear vanity, neither will the Almighty regard it.
items.plainText: Surely God will not hear vanity, neither will the Almighty regard it.

items.text: Although thou sayest thou shalt not see him, yet judgment is before him; therefore trust thou in him.
items.plainText: Although thou sayest thou shalt not see him, yet judgment is before him; therefore trust thou in him.

items.text: But now, because it is not so, he hath visited in his anger; yet he knoweth it not in great extremity:
items.plainText: But now, because it is not so, he hath visited in his anger; yet he knoweth it not in great extremity:

items.text: Therefore doth Job open his mouth in vain; he multiplieth words without knowledge.
items.plainText: Therefore doth Job open his mouth in vain; he multiplieth words without knowledge.
